channel.title: Help with making NPCs drop stuff!
channel.description:
Alright, a here's a code in the NPCDrops.tsm
#Man drops 1:1 995:100 554:100
So I take it that it's supposed to drop coins 100% of the time and bones 100% of the time. So what's the 1:1 mean? Also when I kill a man it never drops coins.
So how do I change what an NPC can drop, the rate it drops it, and how many of the item is dropped??? Thanks in advance although like 5% of my topics in help ever get answered ;s

item.title: Help with making NPCs drop stuff!
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

Alright, a here’s a code in the NPCDrops.tsm

1:1 995:100 554:100

So I take it that it’s supposed to drop coins 100% of the time and bones 100% of the time. So what’s the 1:1 mean? Also when I kill a man it never drops coins.

So how do I change what an NPC can drop, the rate it drops it, and how many of the item is dropped??? Thanks in advance although like 5% of my topics in help ever get answered ;s
